Package proscene

Interface Summary
PSMouseGrabber Interface for objects that grab mouse focus in a PScene.
 

Class Summary
PSAxisPlaneConstraint An abstract class for PSFrame PSConstraints defined by an axis or a plane.
PSCamera A perspective or orthographic camera.
PSCameraConstraint A PSAxisPlaneConstraint defined in the camera coordinate system.
PScene A processing 3D interactive scene.
PSConstraint An interface class for Frame constraints.
PSFrame A PSFrame is a 3D coordinate system, represented by a PSFrame.position() and an PSFrame.orientation().
PSInteractiveCameraFrame The PSInteractiveCameraFrame class represents a PSInteractiveFrame with Camera specific mouse bindings.
PSInteractiveFrame A PSInteractiveFrame is a PSFrame that can be rotated and translated using the mouse.
PSLocalConstraint A PSAxisPlaneConstraint defined in the PSFrame local coordinate system.
PSQuaternion A 4 element unit quaternion represented by single precision floating point x,y,z,w coordinates.
PSUtility Utility class that complements the PVector and PMatrix classes.
PSWorldConstraint A PSAxisPlaneConstraint defined in the world coordinate system.
 

Enum Summary
PSAxisPlaneConstraint.Type Type lists the different types of translation and rotation constraints that are available.
PSCamera.Type Enumerates the two possible types of Camera.
PScene.MouseAction This enum defines mouse actions to be binded to the mouse.
PSInteractiveFrame.CoordinateSystemConvention This enum defines the coordinate system convention which is defined as LEFT_HANDED by default (processing standard).
